name: v1_historicalevents
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool historical_events_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Search through the most famous events in history. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/historicalevents.
API description: API Ninjas Historical Events API endpoint. Returns a list of up to 10 events that match the search parameters. At least one of the following parameters is required: text, year, month, day.

text.description: Query text to search events by. Use keywords or short phrases for best match results. Defaults to 'roman empire'.

month.description: Integer representing the month (e.g., 3 for March). Defaults to None.

day.description: Calendar day of the month. Defaults to None.

year.description: 4-digit year (e.g., 1776). For BC/BCE years, use a negative integer (e.g., -351 for 351 BC). Defaults to None.

offset.description: Number of results to offset (for pagination). Defaults to None.
